text: to (ai rasool yahood ko yaad dilao) jab ham ne un (ke saron) par pahaad ko is tarah lataka diya ki goya saebaan (chhappar) tha aur vah log samajh chuke the ki un par ab gira aur hamane unako hukm diya ki jo kuchh hamane tumhen ata kiya hai use mazabootee se pakad lo aur jo kuchh usamen likha hai yaad rakho taaki tum parahezagaar ban jao
